name: jschreuder/middle
description: Middleware based micro-framework build on components by everyone else

suggests.twig/twig: Required when using the TwigRenderer view-engine implementation
suggests.symfony/routing: Required when using the SymfonyRouter implementation
suggests.zendframework/zend-session: Required when using the ZendSession implementation
suggests.zendframework/zend-diactoros: Required by the RedirectRendererMiddleware and TwigRenderer
